title: Manufacturing and Business Protocols for Goats Milk Soap Penny Adler SD

tasks.task: Manufacture and test goat's milk soap.
subtasks: Create a master formula and recipe.
Source consistent ingredients from reliable suppliers.
Document ingredients and verify their specifications.
Track inventory and maintain ingredient logs.
Develop a labeling system for packaging and sale.
Address safety and compliance with regulations for cosmetic products.
Explain the process of making cream soap and improve product quality.
Discuss the impact of using natural ingredients and addressing customer safety concerns.
